title: The You Beyond You
description: What if the core of our belief system was nothing but a collection of misleading notions? For everyone willing to explore the real dimension of existence, this book is a must-read. Examining life's underlying mechanisms, "The YOU Beyond you" gives full insight into how you can gain full knowledge of your reality and how it operates within us and in the Universe itself. No matter who we are or what our life goal is, negative habits and an unhealthy life culture perturb the delicate balance that allows us to move forward.  You will embark on the path to understanding how bad habits become embedded in our system and thus mold a negative framework within our lives. How to break free from these bad habits and experience the true secret of life through which everything prospers.  A guide for readers of all ages seeking to achieve their life goals. Written with the sole purpose of helping the reader understand how mind, body, and soul work within our environment and how we have been subjected to live as per the age-old beliefs and perceptions, that keep us stagnant. Inspired by biological and psychological theories, ideas, and true-life experiences, this comprehensive guide provides you with an extraordinary pragmatic life approach unveiling the true nature of life.  This book provides key insights into: •	Clearing the mind and body of bad habits that pollute our existence•	Overcoming toxic patterns that hinder the peace of mind•	Improving our surrounding environment•	Exploring the true dynamics of life and how they function•	How to use this new reality and bind it into everyday life•	How to initiate the spiritual awakening in you
author: Ramzi Najjar
